caller_intent: Dalia's property insurance policy with Ncjua was canceled due to lack of proof of roof repair, and she needs guidance to reinstate it.
resolution_steps: Informed Dalia that Ncjua canceled her policy for missing proof of roof repair.
Offered to send an email to her (ester.saraia@gmail.com) requesting photos of the repair.
Mentioned sending a 'statement of no loss' via Conga Sign for electronic signing.
Notified her of a $163.78 payment required to reinstate the policy (covering two months of billing).
Committed to follow up via email once documents are received and payment is made.
knowledge_required: Ncjua's policy reinstatement requirements (proof of repair, statement of no loss).
Process for electronic document signing via Conga Sign.
summary: Jamie from Alliance Insurance informed Dalia that her Ncjua policy was canceled due to missing roof repair proof. She outlined steps to reinstate it: submitting photos of repairs, signing a statement of no loss via Conga Sign, and paying $163.78. Jamie will email her the necessary documents and follow up once completed.
